product_name: Fischer RC Classic My Style Cross-Country Boots - Women's
long_description: The sporty Fischer RC Classic My Style Cross-Country Boots are designed for classic skiing on groomed trails and are ideal for entry-level racers or serious recreational skiers.
short_description: The sporty Fischer RC Classic My Style Cross-Country Boots are designed for classic skiing on groomed trails and are ideal for entry-level racers or serious recreational skiers.
